Demon\u2019s Rage.name: Demon’s Rage

BET.rule_text:

BET.flavour_text:
The air crackled around her. Smoke began to pour out of her eyes as she stared down at Ra'Ha's army. 
"You think I'm a monster. If you want a monster, I'll show you a monster." Rayne's voice pierced through the waves of energy that circled her.

Action - Area Range Dark Attack [4] - Energy 7 and HP 2

JAE.flavour_text: "Humans are so fragile. Your bones break so easily and your life spans are the length of a rat's. I have to be cautious every time I touch you. But, once in a while, it is good to just let go. Now you'll see what true power feels like." ~ Rayne

Alpha.rule_text:
Action - Create - Aura 12

BET.rule_text:

Place Inferno Pits on an unoccupied spot in the arena.
 
Trigger - Inferno Pits
Whenever anything moves onto or is placed onto Inferno Pits, Inferno Pits deals 2 fire damage to it.
BET.flavour_text: Beware the Pits. If the heat and flames don't kill you, then the monsters who live there will. ~ Korr

JAE.rule_text:
Action - Create - Aura 12
Place Inferno Pits on an unoccupied spot in the arena.
 
Trigger - Inferno Pits
Whenever anything moves onto or is placed onto Inferno Pits, Inferno Pits deals 2 Fire damage to it.
JAE.flavour_text:
"Malik, what's over there?" ~ Idiris
"The Inferno Pits. It is a bottomless abyss and the birthplace of all of your deepest nightmares. To banish someone there would be the same as sentencing them to death." ~ Malik

J2.rule_text:
Action - Create - Aura 12
Place Inferno Pits on an unoccupied spot in the arena.
 
Trigger - Inferno Pits
Whenever anything moves onto or is placed onto Inferno Pits, Inferno Pits deals 2 Fire damage to it.
J2.flavour_text:
There are too many other distractions. They frolic in my imagination, creating scenes of the most horrific milieu: oozing limbs writhing, drooling maws gaping, seeping flesh rending, entrails pulling, blood cascading. Laughing, pointing, wiping gouged eyes off their twisted claws, smeared like snot down their festering torsos.  They howl and they crow at my disgust.
Akashic Codex - Part 1, Chapter 10

Underworld Dealings.name: Underworld Dealings
Underworld Dealings.rule_text:
Action - Cast - HP X
Look at the top X cards of your timeline. Put one of those cards into your thoughts and the rest into your memories.
Underworld Dealings.author: Assad Quraishi

Alpha.rule_text:
Action - Cast - HP X
Look at the top X cards of your timeline. Put one of those cards into your thoughts and the rest into your memories.

BET.rule_text:
Action - Cast - HP X
Look at the top X cards of your timeline. Put one of those cards into your thoughts and the rest into your memories.
BET.flavour_text: To achieve real power you have to make a real sacrifice. ~ Rayne

JAE.rule_text:
Action - Cast - HP X
Look at the top X cards of your timeline. Put one of those cards into your thoughts and the rest into your memories.
JAE.flavour_text:
"Rayne, I've spoken to Malik about the Pits and his fear is blocking him from a world of power unmatched against anything in this war. If he just opened his mind a little bit and remove the superstitions of his ancestors, he could become more powerful than all of us combined." ~ Idiris
"My dear Idiris, I think that is what he is really afraid of." ~ Rayne

J2.rule_text:
Action - Cast - HP X
Look at the top X cards of your timeline. Put one of those cards into your thoughts and the rest into your memories.
J2.flavour_text:
"Have I passed your tests, Chaos?"
"Indubitably, my child. With flying colours, no less."
"Good. So now what?"
"Do you feel different?"
"Yes."
"Then leave this place and bring an end to this war."

Akashic Codex - Part 1, Chapter 10

Action - Cast - Aura 8

JAE.rule_text:
Action - Cast - Aura 8
All champions shuffle their thoughts into their timelines and draw that many cards.
JAE.flavour_text: "Ra'Ha, have you lost your mind today? No? I lose my mind at least 3 or 4 times a day. You should do it at least once a day. It is witch recommended. Hahahaha. Did you know before I met your soothsayer, I was a normal girl living a normal life suspended from time and space? She was the first one to help me lose my mind. I should send her a thank you note. Ooo, a bird! Okay, where were we? Yes, I was going to beat you." ~ Kendra

J2.rule_text:
Action - Cast - Aura 8

J2.flavour_text:
"I haven’t had this much fun in ages!" Kendra squealed with delight as she splashed in a pool of blood.
Akashic Codex - Part 1, Chapter 7

The Demon Scrolls.name: The Demon Scrolls
The Demon Scrolls.rule_text:
Swift - Cast - HP 4
Search your timeline for a card and put it into your thoughts. Shuffle your timeline.
The Demon Scrolls.author: Assad Quraishi

Alpha.rule_text:
Swift - Cast - HP 4
Search your timeline for a card and put it into your thoughts. Shuffle your timeline.

BET.rule_text:
Swift - Cast - HP 4
Search your timeline for a card and put it into your thoughts. Shuffle your timeline.
BET.flavour_text: Hidden in these scrolls are the answers to all the mysteries of Jaelara. ~ Rayne

JAE.rule_text:
Swift - Cast - HP 4
Search your timeline for a card and put it into your thoughts. Shuffle your timeline.
JAE.flavour_text: "The most powerful tool for any warrior is knowledge. The demons knew this and wrote the Demon Scrolls. These five scrolls can read your mind and show you the incantation for any spell, any ritual, any text stored within the Library of Sahas. You just need to think of what you want and the scrolls will present it to you." ~ Rayne

Purifying Wave.name: Purifying Wave
Purifying Wave.rule_text:
Action - Cast - Aura 20
Kill all summons. Destroy all alterations.
Purifying Wave.author: Assad Quraishi

Alpha.rule_text:
Action - Cast - Aura 20
Kill all summons. Destroy all alterations.
Alpha.flavour_text: Hidden in these scrolls are the answers to all the mysteries of Jaelara.

BET.rule_text:
Action - Cast - Aura 20
Kill all summons. Destroy all alterations.
BET.flavour_text: We must purify this land of all evil. No matter the cost. - Feng

JAE.rule_text:
Action - Cast - Aura 20
Kill all summons. Destroy all alterations.
JAE.flavour_text: "The people of Vishud and Sahas call me a monster, and maybe I am. But there is a terrible truth about war that no one seems to be willing to admit to themselves: Peace is found through war, not in the absence of it. Everyone wants peace and happiness, but they don’t understand that unless we are all united under one ruler, that will never happen. And all of those people who claim that peace is found in independence, they're the very people who are standing in the way of true peace. They are the ones who are standing in the way of our utopia." ~ Feng

J2.rule_text:
Action - Cast - Aura 20
Kill all summons. Destroy all alterations.
